verses.verse: בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul Saul בְּמָלְכ֑וֹ <S%H4427><s%> be-ma-le-Cho; reigned וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Tei two שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim, years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach and when he had reigned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. over Israel

וַיִּבְחַר־ <S%H977><s%> vai-yiv-char- chose ל֨וֹ lo שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul Saul שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet him three אֲלָפִים֮ <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> mi-Yis-ra-'El [men] of Israel וַיִּהְי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- were with שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul were with Saul אַלְפַּ֗יִם <S%H505><s%> 'al-Pa-yim, [whereof] two thousand בְּמִכְמָשׂ֙ <S%H4363><s%> be-mich-Mas in Michmash וּבְהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> u-ve-Har and in mount בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> 'El, Bethel וְאֶ֗לֶף <S%H505><s%> ve-'E-lef, and a thousand הָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- were with י֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <S%H3129><s%> yo-na-Tan, were with Jonathan בְּגִבְעַ֖ת <S%H1390><s%> be-giv-'At in Gibeah בִּנְיָמִ֑ין <S%H1144><s%> bin-ya-Min; of Benjamin וְיֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> ve-Ye-ter and the rest הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, of the people שִׁלַּ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> shil-Lach he sent אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man לְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <S%H168><s%> le-'o-ha-Lav. to his tent

וַיַּ֣ךְ <S%H5221><s%> vai-Yach smote יוֹנָתָ֗ן <S%H3129><s%> yo-na-Tan, And Jonathan אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> 'et נְצִ֤יב <S%H5333><s%> ne-Tziv the garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim of the Philistines אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that was בְּגֶ֔בַע <S%H1387><s%> be-Ge-va', that [was] in Geba וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-me-'U heard פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim; and the Philistines וְשָׁאוּל֩ <S%H7586><s%> ve-sha-'Ul [of it] And Saul תָּקַ֨ע <S%H8628><s%> ta-Ka' blew בַּשּׁוֹפָ֤ר <S%H7782><s%> bash-sho-Far the trumpet בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol throughout הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz throughout all the land לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> yish-me-'U hear הָעִבְרִֽים׃ <S%H5680><s%> ha-'iv-Rim. Let the Hebrews

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol All יִשְׂרָאֵ֞ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El And all Israel שָׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'U heard לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, say הִכָּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> hik-Kah had smitten שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul [that] Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נְצִ֣יב <S%H5333><s%> ne-Tziv a garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- and also נִבְאַשׁ <S%H887><s%> niv-'ash also was had in abomination יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El and [that] Israel בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> bap-pe-lish-Tim; with the Philistines וַיִּצָּעֲק֥וּ <S%H6817><s%> vai-yitz-tza-'a-Ku were called together הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And the people אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul Saul הַגִּלְגָּֽל׃ <S%H1537><s%> hag-gil-Gal. to Gilgal

וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֞ים <S%H6430><s%> u-fe-lish-Tim And the Philistines נֶאֶסְפ֣וּ׀ <S%H622><s%> ne-'es-Fu gathered themselves together לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <S%H3898><s%> le-hil-la-Chem to fight עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, with Israel שְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim thirty אֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand רֶ֙כֶב֙ <S%H7393><s%> re-chev chariots וְשֵׁ֤שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> ve-She-shet and six אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand פָּרָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6571><s%> pa-ra-Shim, horsemen וְעָ֕ם <S%H5971><s%> ve-'Am and people כַּח֛וֹל <S%H2344><s%> ka-Chol as the sand אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and שְׂפַֽת־ <S%H8193><s%> se-fat- shore הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam which [is] on the sea לָרֹ֑ב <S%H7230><s%> la-Ro; in multitude וַֽיַּעֲלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu and they came up וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְמִכְמָ֔שׂ <S%H4363><s%> ve-mich-Mas, in Michmash קִדְמַ֖ת <S%H6926><s%> kid-Mat eastward בֵּ֥ית beit אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H1007><s%> 'A-ven. from Bethaven

וְאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish When the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel רָאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'U saw כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for צַר־ <S%H6862><s%> tzar- A strait ל֔וֹ lo, כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for נִגַּ֖שׂ <S%H5065><s%> nig-Gas were distressed הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; (for the people וַיִּֽתְחַבְּא֣וּ <S%H2244><s%> vai-yit-chab-be-'U did hide הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, ) then the people בַּמְּעָר֤וֹת <S%H4631><s%> bam-me-'a-Rot themselves in caves וּבַֽחֲוָחִים֙ <S%H2336><s%> u-va-cha-va-Chim thickets וּבַסְּלָעִ֔ים <S%H5553><s%> u-vas-se-la-'Im, and in rocks וּבַצְּרִחִ֖ים <S%H6877><s%> u-vatz-tze-ri-Chim and in high places וּבַבֹּרֽוֹת׃ <S%H953><s%> u-vab-bo-Rot. and in pits

וְעִבְרִ֗ים <S%H5680><s%> ve-'iv-Rim, And [some of] the Hebrews עָֽבְרוּ֙ <S%H5674><s%> 'a-ve-Ru went over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den, Jordan אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz to the land גָּ֖ד <S%H1410><s%> gad of Gad וְגִלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> ve-gil-'Ad; and Gilead וְשָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> ve-sha-'Ul As for Saul עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> o-Den-nu he still בַגִּלְגָּ֔ל <S%H1537><s%> vag-gil-Gal, he [was] yet in Gilgal וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am and all the people חָרְד֥וּ <S%H2729><s%> cha-re-Du him trembling אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav. followed

וַיִּיחֶל vai-yi-chel כוַיֹּ֣וחֶל <S%H3176><s%> vai-Yo-chel cause to קשִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At seven יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim, days לַמּוֹעֵד֙ <S%H4150><s%> lam-mo-'Ed according to the set time אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher set שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El, that Samuel וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- did not בָ֥א <S%H935><s%> va came שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El [had appointed] but Samuel הַגִּלְגָּ֑ל <S%H1537><s%> hag-gil-Gal; not to Gilgal וַיָּ֥פֶץ <S%H6327><s%> vai-Ya-fetz were scattered הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am and the people מֵעָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lav. and

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, And Saul הַגִּ֣שׁוּ <S%H5066><s%> hag-Gi-shu Bring hither אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah a burnt offering וְהַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> ve-hash-she-la-Mim; to me and peace offerings וַיַּ֖עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al And he offered הָעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah. the burnt offering

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, become כְּכַלֹּתוֹ֙ <S%H3615><s%> ke-chal-lo-To And it came to pass that as soon as he had made an end לְהַעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> le-ha-'a-Lot of offering הָעֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah, the burnt offering וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El behold Samuel בָּ֑א <S%H935><s%> Ba; came וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze went out שָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul and Saul לִקְרָאת֖וֹ <S%H7122><s%> lik-ra-To to meet לְבָרֲכֽוֹ׃ <S%H1288><s%> le-va-ra-Cho. him that he might salute

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El And Samuel מֶ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> meh What עָשִׂ֑יתָ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta; What hast thou done וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said שָׁא֡וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul ;And Saul כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because רָאִיתִי֩ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'i-Ti Because I saw כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> chi- Because נָפַ֨ץ <S%H5310><s%> na-Fatz were scattered הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am that the people מֵעָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lai, and וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not בָ֙אתָ֙ <S%H935><s%> va-ta from me and [that] thou camest לְמוֹעֵ֣ד <S%H4150><s%> le-mo-'Ed appointed הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim, not within the days וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> u-fe-lish-Tim and [that] the Philistines נֶאֱסָפִ֥ים <S%H622><s%> ne-'e-sa-Fim gathered themselves together מִכְמָֽשׂ׃ <S%H4363><s%> mich-Mas. at Michmash

וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar, Therefore said עַ֠תָּה <S%H6258><s%> 'At-tah Now יֵרְד֨וּ <S%H3381><s%> ye-re-Du will come down פְלִשְׁתִּ֤ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim I The Philistines אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai against הַגִּלְגָּ֔ל <S%H1537><s%> hag-gil-Gal, now upon me to Gilgal וּפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> u-fe-Nei unto יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo have not חִלִּ֑יתִי <S%H2470><s%> chil-Li-ti; and I have not made supplication וָֽאֶתְאַפַּ֔ק <S%H662><s%> va-'et-'ap-Pak, I forced וָאַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> va-'a-'a-Leh myself therefore and offered הָעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah. a burnt offering ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said שְׁמוּאֵ֛ל <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El And Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- over שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul to Saul נִסְכָּ֑לְתָּ <S%H5528><s%> nis-Kal-ta; Thou hast done foolishly לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo have not שָׁמַ֗רְתָּ <S%H8104><s%> sha-Mar-ta, thou hast not kept אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִצְוַ֞ת <S%H4687><s%> mitz-Vat the commandment יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוָּ֔ךְ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vach, which he commanded כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah, now הֵכִ֨ין <S%H3559><s%> he-Chin have established יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh thee for now would the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַֽמְלַכְתְּךָ֛ <S%H4467><s%> mam-lach-te-Cha thy kingdom אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El upon Israel עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. ever

וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now מַמְלַכְתְּךָ֣ <S%H4467><s%> mam-lach-te-Cha But now thy kingdom לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תָק֑וּם <S%H6965><s%> ta-Kum; shall not continue בִּקֵּשׁ֩ <S%H1245><s%> bik-Kesh hath sought יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God ל֜וֹ lo אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish him a man כִּלְבָב֗וֹ <S%H3824><s%> kil-va-Vo, after his own heart וַיְצַוֵּ֨הוּ <S%H6680><s%> vay-tzav-Ve-hu hath commanded יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God לְנָגִיד֙ <S%H5057><s%> le-na-Gid him [to be] captain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo, over his people כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki because לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo have not שָׁמַ֔רְתָּ <S%H8104><s%> sha-Mar-ta, because thou hast not kept אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- what צִוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-ve-Cha commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. God פ Peh

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom arose שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El, And Samuel וַיַּ֛עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al and gat him up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <S%H1537><s%> hag-gil-Gal from Gilgal גִּבְעַ֣ת <S%H1390><s%> giv-'At unto Gibeah בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> bin-ya-Min; of Benjamin וַיִּפְקֹ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> vai-yif-Kod numbered שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, And Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people הַנִּמְצְאִ֣ים <S%H4672><s%> han-nim-tze-'Im [that were] present עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo, about כְּשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> ke-Shesh with him about six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish. men

וְשָׁא֞וּל <S%H7586><s%> ve-sha-'Ul And Saul וְיוֹנָתָ֣ן <S%H3129><s%> ve-yo-na-Tan and Jonathan בְּנ֗וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No, his son וְהָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ve-ha-'Am and the people הַנִּמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> han-nim-Tza [that were] present עִמָּ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mam, them יֹשְׁבִ֖ים <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vim with them abode בְּגֶ֣בַע <S%H1387><s%> be-Ge-va' in Gibeah בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> bin-ya-Min; of Benjamin וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> u-fe-lish-Tim but the Philistines חָנ֥וּ <S%H2583><s%> cha-Nu encamped בְמִכְמָֽשׂ׃ <S%H4363><s%> ve-mich-Mas. in Michmash
